name: Família Barberà
desc: El Joan i la Rut són parella desde fa set anys, i en porten un parell vivint al pis. Fa poc van decidir que era el moment: volien tenir fills. Ara la Rut està embarassada, i esperen amb il·lusió al nouvingut. Els pares novells estan nerviosos i emocionats, i ja han començat a buscar guarderies aprop de casa per al petit.
descENG: Joan and Rut have been a couple for seven years, and they’ve been living in the flat for the last couple of years. Recently, they decided it was time: they wanted to have children. Rut is now pregnant, and they’re eagerly awaiting the newcomer. The soon-to-be parents are nervous and excited, and they’ve already started looking for daycares near home for the little one.
